msbt.message: I read somewhere that the choices you make in home furnishings are based on your innermost desires. I'm a little nervous about what you'd learn about me from my home decor.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Now that I look at it again, I'm not sure if I really like the placement of my .I guess when you like something a lot, you want it where you can see it.<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" /> Are you like that too, ?
Don't you love how my place is shaping up?Oh, perhaps that was pushy. I just hope you like the style, is all.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, you found the comfiest spot in the whole place. Believe it or not, it's my !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sometimes I'll just cozy up on it with a big cup of tea, reading or knitting Oh, it sounds nice
I don't watch much TV, but I do try to watch the weather report.That way, I know in advance if I'll be able to dry my laundry outside, and whether to water the flowers.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I get a lot more knitting done while I'm listening to my favorite music on my . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's just stitch after stitch, knitting along with the beat. Sometimes it's nice to just get lost in the rhythm.

I try not to live my life by the clock, but it's hard not to worry about how much time it takes me to do things<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Lately, I've been trying not to time myself by <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />looking at my .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />When I start to get stressed out, I think it helps to look at plants. Cool greenery just relaxes me.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It makes me happy to take care of them and watch them thrive. Plants make a place feel like home.

When I get sore or if I just need a break, I'll draw a nice, warm bath. It's a relaxing way to recharge.<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'll light sweet-smelling candles and read a book while I soak in my . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sometimes I'll get so absorbed in what I'm reading that I let the bathwater get cold, .
<20_2 arg="9" />Oh! Don't mind the mess on my !<20_3 arg="3" />I got clumsy and spilled something on it earlier, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I kinda splurged on my <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's my favorite place to study or write, so I do want it to be comfortable, .
, can you play the ?<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm still figuring out the basics <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe someday I'll be able to play some actual music with it.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It turns out it's challenging to use my <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I saw a chef using one on TV, and he made it look easier, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I intended to exercise more with my <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But it's really just sort of decorative at this point
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I guess it's weird that I have inside<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe I'm just trying too hard at being creative here?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What do you think of my ? <20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />I'm quite fond of it myself. It's the perfect accent item I never knew this room needed.

How do you feel about trying out different styles, ?<10_4 /> It's kind of thrilling, isn't it? Well, <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I suggest you try using .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's a great way to explore different aspects of your personality.

The right piece of furniture always strikes a good balance between functionality and design. For example,<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> consider my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />This house would be so cluttered if I didn't have a place to put everything. But at the same time, it's so pretty!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Curious about my little friend? It's .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />I grow fonder and fonder of her the longer we live together. At least, I think it's a she, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Looking for a quiet and respectful roommate? Then may I suggest ? <20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />But I can't promise you'll find one as cute as mine, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Aha! I can see that you're eyeing my .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />You have excellent taste! Though I already knew that, .This painting is a favorite of mine, so I'm glad to see it's a favorite of yours too.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Be careful you don't bump into my !<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Believe me, it won't end well for either of you, . I speak from experience.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I know there's something off about my <20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />But that's part of what gives it its own special charm, .
Oh no! Are you feeling too warm, ? Don't worry.I'm always happy to put my trusty to work!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />No, you aren't imagining things. I really am the proud owner of a radiant . I'm currently working on an article for a well-known science journal. It's really no big deal, . What do you think of the title "The "?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I have to say, this picture of me is a good one!<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />It's hard to take a photo that really looks like who I am on the inside, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I hope you don't think it's too quirky or odd that I keep my in here.<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Everyone should have these kinds of things around. Never forget how to simply have fun, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh! Have you taken an interest in my ?<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Do you like that sort of thing? Sometimes I'm not sure of myself when it comes to home decor.Then again, I am when it comes to things I find fascinating, like my !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You'd think that I use that kind of thing all the time. But no, not my .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />I know, it seems like there's a story hereBut it's simple, really. Some items are a real comfort to have around, like a good friend, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I did a lot of research before I went out and bought my there.I like to know how to use that sort of thing correctly.<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />But I'll tell you a secret. I threw all my research out. And it's worked out just fine, !
Let me know if it's too hot in here for you, .<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I like it toasty, which is why I have .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Look at that. It's a poster of little ol' me!<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />It reminds me of how anxious I was when that photo was taken. I think it turned out well despite my nerves.I just If you could maybe try not to look at it too much, I'd really appreciate it!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ah, I see you've noticed my .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />I love the cover art. It's so neat— it really makes a great decoration!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I once read that flowers have a way of spreading joy. That's why they make great decorations.<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />I think it's true! Or maybe I'm just particularly a flower fan, heehee.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm not messy—promise. It was intentional, leaving out my .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />I think the room really needed a nice addition like that. Don't you agree?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Isn't my interior chic? It's all thanks to my .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Sometimes at night I get spooked thinking someone's standing there. But that's a small price to pay, right?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Isn't it fashionable? I love looking at my .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />It's like turning storage into an art display. I feel like I'm living in a magazine!
